<h1>Fry and the Slurm Factory</h1>
<p>I was all of history's great robot actors - Acting Unit 0.8; Thespomat; David Duchovny! Wow, you got that off the Internet? In my day, the Internet was only used to download pornography. Leela's gonna kill me. Check it out, y'all. Everyone who was invited is here. Throw her in the brig. You can see how I lived before I met you.</p>
<h2>Xmas Story</h2>
<p>No, of course not. It was&hellip; uh&hellip; porno. Yeah, that's it. Moving along&hellip; You, minion. Lift my arm. AFTER HIM! Yes. You gave me a dollar and some candy. Bender! Ship! Stop bickering or I'm going to come back there and change your opinions manually!</p>
<ul>
<li>Tell her you just want to talk. It has nothing to do with mating.</li>
<li>Man, I'm sore all over. I feel like I just went ten rounds with mighty Thor.</li>
<li>This is the worst kind of discrimination: the kind against me!</li>
</ul>
<h3>The Deep South</h3>
<p>Switzerland is small and neutral! We are more like Germany, ambitious and misunderstood! I wish! It's a nickel. Oh, all right, I am. But if anything happens to me, tell them I died robbing some old man. That could be 'my' beautiful soul sitting naked on a couch. If I could just learn to play this stupid thing. For the last time, I don't like lilacs!  Your 'first' wife was the one who liked lilacs!</p>
<h4>The Cryonic Woman</h4>
<p>Bender, I didn't know you liked cooking. That's so cute. Enough about your promiscuous mother, Hermes! We have bigger problems. For the last time, I don't like lilacs!  Your 'first' wife was the one who liked lilacs! But I've never been to the moon! I'll get my kit!</p>
<ol>
<li>Bite my shiny metal ass.</li>
<li>No! Don't jump!</li>
<li>Wow, you got that off the Internet? In my day, the Internet was only used to download pornography.</li>
</ol>
<h5>A Fishful of Dollars</h5>
<p>Just once I'd like to eat dinner with a celebrity who isn't bound and gagged. Soothe us with sweet lies. And so we say goodbye to our beloved pet, Nibbler, who's gone to a place where I, too, hope one day to go. The toilet. Negative, bossy meat creature!</p>
